short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Viewing html files with raw.githack.com made easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter an url to a html file from a git repository (GitHub, Bitbucket or GitLab). That file will be then served to you with a correct mime type to be viewed in your browser using raw.githack.com.
